heading: HR00935
0:
A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO INCLUDE
PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS IN THE TARGETED COVID-19
TESTING IN THE EVENT OF OR BEFORE THEY ARE
REQUIRED TO CONDUCT FACE-TO-FACE CLASSES THIS
COMING AUGUST 24, 2020
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-06-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00935
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO INCLUDE PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS IN THE TARGETED COVID-19 TESTING IN THE EVENT OF OR BEFORE THEY ARE REQUIRED TO CONDUCT FACE-TO-FACE CLASSES THIS COMING AUGUST 24, 2020
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LACSON, VIRGILIO S.
DATE FILED : 2020-06-01
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE ON 2020-06-02
